accounts.name: offramp_program
docs: CHECK offramp program: exists only to derive the allowed offramp PDA

accounts.name: allowed_offramp
docs: CHECK PDA of the router program verifying the signer is an allowed offramp.
If PDA does not exist, the router doesn't allow this offramp

instructions.name: type_version
docs: Returns the program type (name) and version.
Used by offchain code to easily determine which program & version is being interacted with.

errors.name: InvalidToken2022Multisig
errors.msg: Invalid Multisig Account Data for Token 2022

errors.name: InvalidSPLTokenMultisig
errors.msg: Invalid Multisig Account Data for SPL Token

errors.name: PoolSignerNotInMultisig
errors.msg: Token Pool Signer PDA must be m times a signer of the Multisig

errors.name: MultisigMustHaveAtLeastTwoSigners
errors.msg: Multisig must have more than 2 valid signers

errors.name: MultisigMustHaveMoreThanOneSigner
errors.msg: Multisig must have more than one required signer

errors.name: InvalidMultisigOwner
errors.msg: Multisig Owner must match Token Program ID

errors.name: InvalidMultisigThreshold
errors.msg: Invalid multisig threshold: required signatures cannot exceed total signers

errors.name: InvalidMultisigThresholdTooHigh
errors.msg: Invalid multisig m: required signatures cannot exceed the available for outside signers

fields.name: source_pool_address
docs: @dev WARNING: sourcePoolAddress should be checked prior to any processing of funds. Make sure it matches the
expected pool address for the given remoteChainSelector.
